sentences.en: By refusing to discuss euthanasia, they usher in something worse.
sentences.cn: 而拒绝讨论安乐死,将预示着更大的灾难.

sentences.en: He was thankful euthanasia was not an option when he requested it.
sentences.cn: 他很庆幸当他要求补执行安乐死的时候,安乐死却不可行.

sentences.en: In a Greek water closet he breathed his last: euthanasia.
sentences.cn: 在一座希腊厕所里,他咽了最后一口气,安乐死.

sentences.en: It is against the law for doctor to practise euthanasia.
sentences.cn: 医生施行安死术是违法的.

sentences.en: Many people applaud and argue that euthanasia should be legalized.
sentences.cn: 许多人拍手叫好,认为安乐死应当合法化.

sentences.en: Many people, though are totally against the practice of euthanasia, Dr.
sentences.cn: 然而,许多人完全反对安乐死.

sentences.en: Now the Dutch are considering permitting euthanasia for babies.
sentences.cn: 现在荷兰正在考虑关于对婴儿实施安乐死的问题.

sentences.en: Some people are pressured toward euthanasia by exhausted and impatient relatives.
sentences.cn: 有些病人迫于亲属们精疲力尽、失去耐心的压力,选择安乐死.

sentences.en: The animal was in so much pain that the vet suggested euthanasia.
sentences.cn: 这个动物非常痛苦,兽医建议让它安乐死.

sentences.en: The disclosures will reopen the highly charged debate about euthanasia.
sentences.cn: 这些数字的披露再次引起了对安乐死的激烈争论.

sentences.en: The doctor refused to practice euthanasia on that terminally ill patient.
sentences.cn: 医师拒绝在那位末期病人身上施行安乐死.

sentences.en: The legalization of euthanasia is an issue of controversy.
sentences.cn: 安乐死的合法化是具有争议性的话题.

sentences.en: They canvassed the pros and cons of euthanasia.
sentences.cn: 他们彻底讨论有关安乐死的正反两方面的意见.

sentences.en: This covers proper veterinary care, competition injuries, euthanasia and retirement.
sentences.cn: 这涵盖适当的医疗照顾 、 运动伤害 、 安乐死与退休.

sentences.en: This essay has researched the legalization of active voluntary euthanasia.
sentences.cn: 本文的研究对象是主动自愿安乐死的合法化问题.

trans.tran_cn: 安乐死，安然去世，无苦痛的死亡
trans.tran_en: the deliberate killing of a person who is very ill and going to die, in order to stop them suffering
